table_caption: Sample characteristics of the study population.
table_foot: AD = Alzheimer's disease, CVD = cardiovascular disease, ICV = intracranial volume, MMSE = mini mental state examination, VV = ventricle volume, WMH = white matter hyperintensities.aWMH volume ≤ 0.5% of the total intracranial volume, corresponding approximately to Fazekas score 0−1.bWMH volume ≥ 1% of the total intracranial volume, corresponding approximately to Fazekas score 2−3.
